name: Spin Ball
description:
Keep the ball as long as possible by controlling the platform. Earn points every time you touch the ball.

Controls: 

  • "A" to turn left
  • "D" to turn right
  • "Space" to start
  • Mouse to click buttons, I guess

Credits:
